title: Prevalence, patterns, and disclosure of complementary and alternative medicine (CAM) use among patients with thyroid diseases: A cross-sectional study in Iran
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mohadeseh Ostovar, Mesbah Shams, Marjan Mahmoudi, Azizallah Dehghan, Arezoo Moini Jazani, Mohammad Hashem Hashempur
